name: Blind Mind (itch)
description:
⁞⁞ Experimental VR promenade ⁞⁞

⁞⁞ Blind Mind is optimised for the Oculus Rift DK2 and a gamepad, but it can be played on a regular computer screen with a mouse and WASD controllers. Better with sound!

⁞⁞ Game created during ZooMachines Festival 2015 in 48 hours by Adriel Beaver, Jérémie Aronowiez, Damien Blanchard, Jérôme Bonamy, Maxime Dumon & Eloi Strée

⁞⁞ Blind Mind is a singleplayer experimental game where the player embodies a blind character, and must use their other senses to find their way through a maze.

⁞⁞ They are able to detect contact (yellow particles) and can send a blast (pink particles) to get a glimpse of their environment. Sometimes they'll meet the path of other characters, whose cues they can follow for an easier progression.

⁞⁞ Two game modes are avalaible: Journey, which allows a free discovery of the maze, & Escape, in which the player has to find the end of the maze in a limited amount of time.
